code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import logo from'../logo/plagiguard.png';import{Navbar as RBNavbar,Nav,Container,NavDropdown}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const navigate=useNavigate();const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')||'{}');const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('user');localStorage.removeItem('userEmail');localStorage.removeItem('token');navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RBNavbar,{bg:"primary",variant:"dark",expand:"lg",className:"shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(RBNavbar.Brand,{href:"/dashboard",className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"PlagiGuard Logo",className:"me-2",style:{height:'40px',width:'auto'}}),"PlagiGuard"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RBNavbar.Toggle,{"aria-controls":"navbarNav"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(RBNavbar.Collapse,{id:"navbarNav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"me-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/dashboard",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/history",children:"History"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/profile",children:"Profile"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-white me-3",children:["Welcome, ",user.fullName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-light",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]})]})});}export default Navbar;
